name: chromogenic
content:
chromogenic adjective
(PHOTOGRAPHY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
art
  specialized Chromogenic photographs are made using chromogens (= substances that produce colour) to produce a very clear image: "The Blue Lagoon" is a large chromogenic print showing bathers in one of Iceland's hot springs. The image shows two chromogenic colour prints from his retrospective at the National Gallery.

Physical & chemical processes
chromogenic adjective
(CHEMISTRY/BIOLOGY)
chemistry, biology
  specialized involving the production of colour : Most chromogenic staining methods were developed in the second half of the twentieth century. Since the chromogenic reaction is concentrated within the bacterial colony, the analysis is straightforward.
